text: Halenia taruga-gasso is a species of plant in the Gentianaceae family. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical high- altitude grassland. ==References== taruga-gasso Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Near threatened plants Category:Near threatened biota of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1916
title: Halenia taruga-gasso
